commands.value: (_USER_) slaps (_PARAMETER_) with a large Red Snapper
(_USER_) hammers (_PARAMETER_) with a squeaky inflatable hammer
(_USER_) asserts their dominance over (_PARAMETER_) and rides it into battle like a velociraptor
Hey Blues! Be sure to take a break soon! (_ONLINE_CHECK_)
support Blues on YouTube at http://www.youtube.com/bluesmcgroove
Check out The Spawn mumble at www.thespawn.net

Coebot is a fork of Geobot, an Open Source Twitch.tv bot written in Java. Modified by Alefnull, Endsgamer, and Twisol. Originally used in Coestar's twitch stream and used with permission from the creators. Coebot is currently on (_NUMCHANNELS_) channels.
Blues reached his goal and shaved his beard! You can still donate at www.extra-life.org/participant/bluesmcgroove/
You can support Blues by subscribing to him at http://www.youtube.com/bluesmcgroove
I am BlueMcGroove and you can find me at (_STEAM_PROFILE_) and I am playing (_GAME_).
Like what you see? Click the follow button! You can also follow Blues on Twitter! www.twitter.com/BluesMcGroove
You can still donate to Extra Life over at www.extra-life.org/participant/bluesmcgroove/
Blues is currently using CoeBot, made by Alefnull, Twisol, and Endsgamer!
Use +ht to help Blues to know when he should highlight a stream!
Watch all the streams at once here! http://multitwitch.tv/bluesmcgroove/(_PARAMETER_)
Join in the fun at: us.playmindcrack.com
You become regular by attending streams regularly and being a positive part of the chat.
Enjoying the stream? Share it with your followers! (_TWEET_URL_) (_ONLINE_CHECK_)

autoReplies.response: Follow Blues on Twitter for stream updates! http://www.twitter.com/bluesmcgroove/
Blues is playing (_STEAM_GAME_) which can be found at (_STEAM_STORE_)

quotes: "Quotable? Why aren't you guys quoting me?!"
"I dont exactly know... OH DIAMONDS!"
"Blues.exe has failed. Please restart"
This game requires a lot of my concen--Fuck!
They probably hit the bottom of a pan with a...uh...stinkin' thingamabobber. Whatchamacallit...pan-pot-thing-pan-thing...I don't know what I'm trying to say, just ignore me.
"I could just stare at chests all night."
"Yes, I'll let you see my package!"
"I'll stick all my things everywhere"
"I have a chicken in my fuck."
"Um fuck, um fuck, um fuck, um fuck!"
Woow Words
there...aim...dead...get the...fucking shit...of of the thing
You [eric1_z] and Break can both collaborate and shit... on... shit...
OW! You! Why are you spitting?
HOLY SHIT it was behind me, OH fuckin' no! Fuckin' ow. Fuck. Turn around. Isaac, Run. Christ... Jesus. Legs-B-Gone. uh-this SHIT um SHIT. Smack it smack it smack it god-damn-it feel...
"Holy shit! Fuck! NO! No no no no no no no. Jesus christ! HOOOOLY FUCKING, JESUS!"
"This is the sort of game that MYEHH"
"I was opening the door, you... anus. but thank you"
"I don't want to go in any of these directions... so lets just head first into them HELLO BITCH! oh..."
"Pick the nose, give me the boogers, y'know what, lets just make a pair of weird nipple clamps."
"Now it's just a whack off"
"you're, dead, you're dead, you sound like a cow"
